name: dmmptssf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqsstri(cdm(c0), c1, crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
stmt.pretty: eqsstri(dom(c0), c1, { s0 ∈ c1 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 })

body.origin:
|- wss(cdm(c0), c1)
-| wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wss(crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cdm(c0), c1)
-| wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wss(crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cdm(c0), c1)
-| wss(crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), c1)
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wss(crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), c1)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cdm(c0), c1)
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

comment: The domain of a mapping is a subset of its base class. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
